root.name: Signal Ops
root.description: Main FeaturesA four element squad you can control simultaneously;Have direct control over several windows in-game;Use stealth mechanics with shadows;Cooperative multiplayer throughout the entire campaign.Minimum System RequirementsWindows XP / Vista / 7 / 8Intel Core 2 Duo 2.6 GHz / AMD Athlon II X2 2.8 GHz3 GB RAMIntel HD 3000, GeForce 8600 GT, Radeon HD 3650 or better with 512 MB memory2GB HDD
